title: MD
biography: Sérgio Henrique Ferreira was a Brazilian physician and pharmacologist noted for the discovery of the bradykinin potentiating factor, which led to new and widely used anti-hypertension drugs — the ACE inhibitors.
aiSummary: Sergio Henrique Ferreira is a pharmacology specialist with an H-index of 18 at University of São Paulo (Member). Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
